title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.10 - Travel vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.10 - Travel vouchers

State Regulations
A travel voucher, Division of Housing form HM-35
(Exhibit B of Appendix S-3), will be prepared by each individual claiming
reimbursement. The division management representative may approve the form in
the field if it is acceptable. The authority may await the visit of the
management representative for such purpose or may forward it to the division
together with all substantiating papers. Hotel bills and any other
substantiating papers shall remain attached to the travel voucher file copy at
all times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-4.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
